FuncDef: The display inof configuration host command displays the configuration of iNOF zone members on the device. The display inof configuration host command displays the configuration of iNOF zone members on the device. This command is supported only on the CE6860-SAN, CE6866K, CE6866, CE6860-HAM, CE6885-SAN, CE8850-SAN, CE8851K, CE8851-32CQ8DQ-P and CE8850-HAM.

ParaDef.Info:
Displays the configuration of hosts on only one reflector.
-
